medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has had RUQ and epigastric pain since the night after eating a prosciutto and fig pizza. The pain worsened yesterday and significantly so today. No fever, chills, or nausea but no vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diverticulitis, GERD, Anxiety; Past surgical history includes appendectomy and tonsillectomy.
